short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meet Amy, your virtual assistant. She'll help you keep track of tasks and events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amy is a task management tool designed to help professionals keep track of tasks and the resources associated with them. Simply add the extension, type in a task name, enter a date/time to be reminded, and an optional URL for the task.

Amy will keep a list of tasks visible in the dropdown and remind you when the task is due. If a link is present, Amy will automatically open a new tab with the URL for the task when you click on the "complete" button.
